column1: # Each line represents a rule, the
# 1. Feature: The name to be given when the rule match
#    Matched features will concatenate according to the sequence list here
#    For example, if Lenovo_ThinkPad_Dock and Targus_Dock
#    both matched, the profile will have following feature list
#    Valid values: HOST, NET_NAME, NEIGH_MAC and USB
#    Feature will be reckoned when the glob pattern is matched.
